casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Sam Babb CLONTS, III 222A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 7, 2017 Daniel M. Blau, Attorney at Law, Robert Hale, Jr., Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Clonts, Sam Babb (III). Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of July 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of July 2017."
